comments:

If this does not happen with another VM (i.e. not sidecar), then I suggest we 
have the sidecar people look at this. Error 24 indicates "invalid location".
Problem only occurrs with the sidecar vm.
What code are you stepping over?
Marking as won't fix. A new bug should be opened with J9/Sidecar.

J9 Bug report is here: https://bugs.ott.oti.com/show_bug.cgi?id=94622

Did Thomas get the information required to duplicate the Bug? I don't see a 
response to his query.

I was debugging Eclipse.  I don't remember exactly what.  I was using M4 as 
indicated.  Since this bug report I've stopped using J9.
